actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a pilot program within the Office on Violence Against Women of the Department of Justice relating to advocacy for domestic violence, sexual assault, dating violence, and stalking victims, and for other purposes.
short_title: Reaching Every Survivor with Police and On-site Nonprofit Services Evaluations Act of 2022

summary.text:
Reaching Every Survivor with Police and On-site Nonprofit Services Evaluations Act of 2022 or the RESPONSE Act of 2022

This bill requires the Office on Violence Against Women of the Department of Justice to establish a pilot program under which community-based organizations or victim service providers may dispatch victim advocates to crime scenes involving domestic violence, sexual assault, dating violence, or stalking.

titles.title: Reaching Every Survivor with Police and On-site Nonprofit Services Evaluations Act of 2022

A bill to establish a pilot program within the Office on Violence Against Women of the Department of Justice relating to advocacy for domestic violence, sexual assault, dating violence, and stalking victims, and for other purposes.
